CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT walks into room followed by CHI . INV is outside the room . the camera shows only the feet of MOT and CHI
MOT walks over to table and sets something down
CHI walks closer to the table
both MOT and CHI move closer to the table
<bef> MOT takes sharp intake of breath
MOT and CHI are off camera
<aft> MOT opens lid to a box

MOT takes book out of box . MOT walks away from the table
